text: Dominici is a progressive metal band that started in 2005 by former Dream Theater vocalist, Charlie Dominici. Their only published works are the three albums that make up the O3 Trilogy. Dominici also opened for three Dream Theater concerts, during Dream Theater's "Chaos in Motion Tour." ==Band members== * Charlie Dominici - vocals * Brian Maillard - guitars * Americo Rigoldi - keyboards * Riccardo eRIK Atzeni - electric bass * Yan Maillard - drums ==Other websites== *Official website Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Progressive rock bands Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: Dominici
